info.name: Volatile for HoneyChan
info.description: Volatile for Honeychan is a fork of "Photon for N0L.CH" with improvements and modifications for HoneyChan. Volatile for HoneyChan should work with any tinyboard installation; however, it works best with the Categories theme.
info.additionalInfo:
Styled Pages:
- news.html
- sidebar.html
- recent.html
- bans.html
- search.php
- Mod/Admin Panel
- Boards
- Ukko (/*/ - All)
